cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mame

sentence.kanji: 今、豆を煮ています。
sentence.romaji: ima mame wo nite imasu
sentence.english: I'm boiling some beans now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eiyou

sentence.kanji: 豆腐は栄養のある食べ物です。
sentence.romaji: toufu ha eiyou no aru tabemono desu
sentence.english: Bean curd is a nutritious food.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bonchi

sentence.kanji: 盆地は夏、とても暑いんだ。
sentence.romaji: bonchi ha natsu、totemo atsui n da
sentence.english: It's very hot in the valley in summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bon

sentence.kanji: お盆は実家に帰りました。
sentence.romaji: o bon ha jika ni kaerimashita
sentence.english: I returned to my parents' home at the Bon festival.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bon

sentence.kanji: 母が料理をお盆に乗せたの。
sentence.romaji: haha ga ryouri wo obon ni noseta no
sentence.english: My mother put the dishes on a tray.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bonodori

sentence.kanji: みんなで盆踊りに行きました。
sentence.romaji: minna de bonodori ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We all went to the Bon festival dance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's su

sentence.kanji: お酢を入れすぎて酸っぱい。
sentence.romaji: o su wo iresugite supai
sentence.english: It's sour because I put in too much vinegar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taigai

sentence.kanji: 大概、風邪は寝ていれば治ります。
sentence.romaji: taigai kaze ha nete ireba naorimasu
sentence.english: Generally, colds get better after you get some sleep.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hogaraka

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても朗らかな人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo hogaraka na hito desu
sentence.english: He's a very cheerful person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kojiki

sentence.kanji: 乞食が公園のベンチで寝ている。
sentence.romaji: kojiki ga kouen no benchi de nete iru
sentence.english: A beggar is sleeping on the park bench.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yunomi

sentence.kanji: 湯飲みにはお茶を入れてお茶碗にはご飯をよそいます。
sentence.romaji: yunomi ni ha ocha wo irete o chawan ni ha gohan wo yosoimasu
sentence.english: We pour tea in a teacup and serve rice in a rice bowl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mochi

sentence.kanji: 正月には餅を食べますよ。
sentence.romaji: shougatsu ni ha mochi wo tabemasu yo
sentence.english: We eat rice cakes during the New Year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsui

sentence.kanji: このスープはとても熱い。
sentence.romaji: kono su-pu ha totemo atsui
sentence.english: This soup is very hot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's samui

sentence.kanji: この部屋は寒いです。
sentence.romaji: kono heya ha samui desu
sentence.english: It's cold in this room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atarashii

sentence.kanji: 彼の車は新しい。
sentence.romaji: kare no kuruma ha atarashii
sentence.english: His car is new.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karai

sentence.kanji: 彼は辛いものが好きです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha karai mono ga suki desu
sentence.english: He likes spicy food.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oya

sentence.kanji: 親の愛は有り難い。
sentence.romaji: oya no ai ha arigatai
sentence.english: We're grateful for our parents' love.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yobu

sentence.kanji: ウェイターを呼びましょう。
sentence.romaji: ueita- wo yobimashou
sentence.english: Let's call the waiter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mune

sentence.kanji: 胸に少し痛みがあります。
sentence.romaji: mune ni sukoshi itami ga arimasu
sentence.english: I have a slight pain in my chest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiragana

sentence.kanji: 私は平仮名を全部読めます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha hiragana wo zenbu yomemasu
sentence.english: I can read all the hiragana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's netsu

sentence.kanji: 昨日の夜、熱が出ました。
sentence.romaji: kinou no yoru netsu ga demashita
sentence.english: I had a fever last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinnen

sentence.kanji: 新年明けましておめでとうございます。
sentence.romaji: shinnen akemashite omedetou gozaimasu
sentence.english: Happy new year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinsetsu

sentence.kanji: 親切にしてくださってどうもありがとうございます。
sentence.romaji: shinsetsu ni shite kudasate doumo arigatou gozaimasu
sentence.english: Thank you for being so kind to me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fushinsetsu

sentence.kanji: その店員は不親切だった。
sentence.romaji: sono tenin ha fushinsetsu data
sentence.english: That store clerk was unkind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houkoku

sentence.kanji: 昨日の会議について報告があります。
sentence.romaji: kinou no kaigi ni tsuite houkoku ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a report about yesterday's conference.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heiwa

sentence.kanji: この国は平和です。
sentence.romaji: kono kuni ha heiwa desu
sentence.english: This country is peaceful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heisei

sentence.kanji: 彼女は平成3年生まれです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha heisei sannen umare desu
sentence.english: She was born in Heisei Year 3 (1991).

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gijutsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は非常に高い技術を持っている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hijou ni takai gijutsu wo mote iru
sentence.english: He has very advanced skills.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yameru

sentence.kanji: 彼は会社を辞めます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaisha wo yamemasu
sentence.english: He's leaving the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jisho

sentence.kanji: 彼女は辞書をよく使います。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha jisho wo yoku tsukaimasu
sentence.english: She often uses the dictionary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's samusa

sentence.kanji: 今日は厳しい寒さになるでしょう。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha kibishii samusa ni naru deshou
sentence.english: It will probably be extremely cold today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikoku

sentence.kanji: 遅刻しないでください。
sentence.romaji: chikoku shinai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please don't be late.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukou

sentence.kanji: 彼女の家族に不幸があった。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no kazoku ni fukou ga ata
sentence.english: A misfortune befell her family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiawase

sentence.kanji: 良い友達がいて私は幸せだ。
sentence.romaji: ii tomodachi ga ite watashi ha shiawase da
sentence.english: I'm happy to have good friends.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiokarai

sentence.kanji: 海の水は塩辛い。
sentence.romaji: umi no mizu ha shiokarai
sentence.english: Sea water is salty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitashii

sentence.kanji: 週末、親しい友達を家に呼んだ。
sentence.romaji: shuumatsu shitashii tomodachi wo ie ni yonda
sentence.english: I invited a good friend to my house over the weekend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shujutsu

sentence.kanji: 父は胸の手術をした。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha mune no shujutsu wo shita
sentence.english: My father had a chest operation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bijutsukan

sentence.kanji: 昨日、美術館に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kinou bijutsukan ni ikimashita
sentence.english: I went to the museum yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noberu

sentence.kanji: 上司が意見を述べた。
sentence.romaji: joushi ga iken wo nobeta
sentence.english: Our boss gave us his opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's korosu

sentence.kanji: 私は生き物を殺すのが嫌いだ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ikimono wo korosu no ga kirai da
sentence.english: I hate killing living things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oozei

sentence.kanji: 大勢で食事に出かけました。
sentence.romaji: oozei de shokuji ni dekakemashita
sentence.english: We went out to eat in a large group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shisei

sentence.kanji: あの子はいつも姿勢が悪い。
sentence.romaji: ano ko ha itsumo shisei ga warui
sentence.english: That kid always has bad posture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ojigi

sentence.kanji: 皆、社長にお辞儀をした。
sentence.romaji: minna shachou ni ojigi wo shita
sentence.english: Everyone bowed to the company president.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabe

sentence.kanji: 壁に絵が掛かっている。
sentence.romaji: kabe ni e ga kakate iru
sentence.english: There's a painting on the wall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ojousan

sentence.kanji: お嬢さんはおいくつですか。
sentence.romaji: ojousan ha oikutsu desu ka
sentence.english: How old is your daughter?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryoushin

sentence.kanji: 私の両親は大阪に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ryoushin ha oosaka ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: My parents live in Osaka.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houdou

sentence.kanji: 夜中もテレビで台風の報道をしていた。
sentence.romaji: yonaka mo terebi de taifuu no houdou wo shite ita
sentence.english: The typhoon was also reported on television during the night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuushi

sentence.kanji: 家計の収支が合わないの。
sentence.romaji: kakei no shuushi ga awanai no
sentence.english: The household income and expenses do not match.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenshuu

sentence.kanji: 税金の額は年収によって変わります。
sentence.romaji: zeikin no gaku ha nenshuu ni yote kawarimasu
sentence.english: The amount of tax depends on the annual income.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nesuru

sentence.kanji: 鉄は熱すると曲がるんだ。
sentence.romaji: tetsu ha nesuru to magaru n da
sentence.english: Iron bends if you heat it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denpou

sentence.kanji: 実家の母から電報が来ました。
sentence.romaji: jika no haha kara denpou ga kimashita
sentence.english: A telegram came from my mother at home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinsetsu

sentence.kanji: ご親切は決して忘れません。
sentence.romaji: goshinsetsu ha keshite wasuremasen
sentence.english: I will never forget your kindness.
